text: Thüringer Volkszeitung ('Thuringia People's Newspaper') was a communist newspaper published from Erfurt 1945–1946. It was the organ of the Communist Party of Germany in Thuringia. The paper was published thrice weekly in August 1945. It then became a daily newspaper, published from September 2, 1945 to April 6, 1945. It merged with Tribüne, forming the newspaper Thüringer Volk.http://icon.crl.edu/detail.php?language=German&country;=&title;=&oclcno;=&begindate;=&institution;=&sort;=language&sortOrder;=ASC&item;=75216&recIndex;=29&recCount;=1622 ==References== Category:German-language newspapers Category:Newspapers published in Germany Category:Communist newspapers Category:Communist Party of Germany Category:Mass media in Erfurt
title: Thüringer Volkszeitung
